message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I think a 60/40 split is a fair starting point, considering the inflation will affect us both.
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I think I deserve more considering the inflation. Let's try 60/40 again, but with me getting the larger share this time.
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take a slight cut, but I think a 55/45 split is fair considering the inflation.
